vote.title: Authorize an eight-year service contract for International Organization for Standardization data management system for the Office of Environmental Quality and Sustainability - Intelex Technologies, Inc., most advantageous proposer of four - Not to exceed $1,143,171.31 - Financing:  General Fund ($833,600.00) and Stormwater Drainage Management Fund ($309,571.31) (subject to annual appropriations)
